effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 616,477.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 22,745 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 68,235 Nature Damage instead.
Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 191 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Moonlit Cloak of Unrelenting Justice

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
